kichcho manussa patilabho kichchan machchana jiwithan ....”yannehi adahasa, melesa minisath bawa labima, manushya aathmayak labima apahasuyi, minisunge diwi pawathma da apahasuyi, emenma saddharmaya asuru kirimata labima ha buduwarunge pahala wimada durlaba wana bawayi.ee wagema, melesa paramartha manushya jiwithayak labima ( dullabhancha manussaththan ) koyitharam durlabha karanayak da pilibandawa ‘ sanyuktha nikaye - oopamma sanyukthaye, nakhasikha suthrayeth’ pahadili kara thibenawa.warak budu radun niya mathupitata pas tikak gena ‘ mahaneni, me niya poththa uda thiyena pas da wadi, maha polowe thiyena pas da wadi’ kiyala ahala.
